bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of xuan 痃 , string-illness, caused by a consumption of ren shen 人參 in summer. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren shen 人參 , Zheng wu 正誤 , Correction of errors, quotes Lei gong pao zhi lun 雷公炮炙論 4 ：夏中少使，發心痃之患也 . 李時珍認為：雷斅反謂發心痃之 患，非矣。痃乃臍旁積氣，非心病也。人參能養正破堅積，豈有發痃之 理 , “[Lei Xu states:] “In summer, one should consume only small amounts lest he suffers from heart string-illness . LSZ: When Lei Xu stated that [ ren shen ] causes ailments of stomach turnover and heart string-illness , he was wrong. The string-illness is a qi accumulation to the side of the navel; it is not a heart disease. Ren shen is capable of nourishing proper [qi] and breaking up hard accumulations. How could it be that it leads to a string-illness?”
